manifest.name: Local Images Plus
manifest.description: Local Images Plus plugin searches for all external media links in your notes, downloads and saves them locally and adjusts the links in your notes to point to the saved files.
manifest.author: catalysm, aleksey-rezvov, Sergei Korneev

data.manifestValue: Local Images Plus plugin searches for all external media links in your notes, downloads and saves them locally and adjusts the links in your notes to point to the saved files.
data.communityListValue: A reincarnation of Local Images to download images in Markdown notes to local storage.
